analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: dassanena pahātabbam hetum dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa

original: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo
analyzed: dassanena pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
